title: Guess The Champion!
body:
http://leaguememe.com/uploads/league/4651272855.jpg

This took a lot of work to make and might be tricky to figure it out

replies.body: definitely not blitzcrank
It's also definitely not udyr.
Its Graves, he has no cigar
I honestly thought it was obvious and yet so many people are so wrong...

And you think they seriously don't know the answer.
Obviously?

Hmm, are you 5 or something? This level of trolling makes me cringe. Not funny at all.
*WOOSH*

Pretty hard to tell, but I think that's Anivia.
The ice shards tipped me off.
Yeah because anivia totally has guns

Your head.
is that Blakinola?

GRENINJA IS THAT YOU!?

Wrong.
Draven doesn't do everything.
Everything tries to imitate Draven!
draven tries to imitate draven

Fixed.
Because i can totally see spinning axes
You need to look  closer, use your imagination
With style

I see what you did there {{sticker:zombie-brand-clap}}
It has to be {{champion:16}}. Who else shoots stars at people?
She shoots bananas...

URGOT {{champion:83}} ?

dat face when ulting tough

gj

New champion? {{champion:83}}

I'll ruin the joke >:)

**LUCIAN**.
{{sticker:slayer-jinx-unamused}} {{sticker:zombie-brand-mindblown}} {{sticker:zombie-nunu-bummed}}

Is anything he posts ever funny?
How did he ruin it? it is lucian... half the people are too blind to see that its lucian.... faith lost in league community... oh wait... i never had faith
Again, *WOOSH*
